solution_line_template: He already has a total of {green_plates} + {blue_plates} = <<{green_plates}+{blue_plates}={plates_already_has}>>{plates_already_has} paper plates.
Therefore, Max needs {total_needed_plates} - {plates_already_has} = <<{total_needed_plates}-{plates_already_has}={plates_needed_more}>>{plates_needed_more} more paper plates.
